channel.title: Scan on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Scan on TLDRBins

item.title: Nmap
item.description: Nmap Scan TCP UDP Script target=<TARGET> nmap -p- --min-rate 10000 -oA ./nmap-alltcp $target ports=$(cat nmap-alltcp.nmap| grep -Eo "^[0-9]+" | tr '\n' ',' | sed -r 's/,$//') nmap -p $ports -sCV -oA ./nmap-tcpscripts $target target=<TARGET> nmap -sU --min-rate 10000 -oA ./nmap-udp $target ports=$(cat nmap-udp.nmap| grep -Eo "^[0-9]+" | tr '\n' ',' | sed -r 's/,$//') nmap -p $ports -sU -sCV -oA ./nmap-udpscripts $target Update scripts DB nmap --script-updatedb Search scripts nmap --script-help ftp* Scan with a script nmap --script=ftp-anon -sV -sC -p 21 <TARGET> Scan with all scripts nmap --script=smb-vuln* -sV -sC -p 445 <TARGET> Run script with args nmap -p <TARGET_PORT> <TARGET> --script <SCRIPT_NAME> --script-args="<SCRIPT_ARGS>"
